Production:
May 1979

Dates: 1979/05/12-1979/05/27

Place: National Theatre of Japan


Performances:

May 1979: The Battle of Ichinotani

May 1979: The Crossroads of Gappo

May 1979: The Mask Peddler

May 1979: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees

May 1979: The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo

May 1979: Announcement of the current performance being dedicated to the memory of Kanji Tsuruzawa VI
